/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a bustling street scene in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, looking upwards towards the towering buildings and the clear blue sky. The sun shines brightly, casting a warm glow over the scene. The street is filled with cars and buses, indicating a busy time of day. The buildings on either side of the street are tall and modern, showcasing the architectural style of the city. The colors in the image are vibrant, with the blue of the sky contrasting with the various hues of the buildings and vehicles.
